title: (x) Sweet&Sexy (1) - Barmeno/FF Sari {Yves}
content:
hi, i would like to know what font this is and who did it!?   
   
 [www.sweetandsexy.ch/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141343/http:/www.sweetandsexy.ch/)   
   
[logo]...thanx \*armin
author: inbox

comments.content: The only differences I can see in those two fonts is that the M in Sari is splayed, and the R in Sari has a little curve near the top of the leg. Sari also has non-lining (OSF) numerals as the standard set, with lining numerals in the Expert set.
